description.value:
Disciples are warlocks who act both as clerics and pact agents of a god's will. When you select this dedication, choose a domain from your patron deity's list. You can cast the initial domain spell for that domain as a warlock invocation. When you reach 10th level, you gain the ability to invoke the advanced domain spell as a warlock invocation.
    Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the disciple archetype.
